item.title: BlackRock Adds Its Bitcoin ETF to Model Portfolio for First Time
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The world’s biggest asset manager is finally allowing Bitcoin into its $150 billion model-portfolio universe. BlackRock Inc. is adding a 1% to 2% allocation to the $48 billion iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF (ticker IBIT) in its target allocation portfolios that allow for alternatives, acc...

item.title: BlackRock, Fidelity Challenge Hedge Funds With Trend-Chaser Bets
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Trend-chasing hedge funds are facing a fresh wave of competition from the ETF world, as asset managers make their latest push to open up strategies to the masses that were once reserved for the financial elite. BlackRock, Invesco and Fidelity have all recently filed to launch so-calle...

item.title: BlackRock Ends Diversity Goals, Merges DEI Staff Into New Team
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- BlackRock Inc. scrapped its “aspirational workforce representation” objectives, reversing course on earlier goals after President Donald Trump moved to end diversity, equity and inclusion, or DEI, practices. The world’s largest asset manager will abandon specific targets to increase t...

item.title: ECB Weighs Bank Inspection Changes as Oversight Criticism Mounts
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Officials who help steer the European Central Bank’s oversight arm want it to take a fresh look at how it conducts inspections at lenders, to address criticism that the process is overly cumbersome. Several regulators from around Europe, who requested anonymity to discuss internal del...

item.title: US Treasury Rally Sends Yields Back Below 4% as Inflation Cools
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The US Treasury market posted its biggest monthly gain since July, ending the period with short-term yields back below 4% as benign inflation data boosted wagers on Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts. Yields on two-, three- and five-year Treasury notes fell as much as six basis points...

item.title: French, Italian Inflation Figures Support Case for ECB Rate Cuts
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- French inflation retreated to its lowest level in four years, while prices in Italy unexpectedly held steady — backing continued interest-rate cuts by the European Central Bank. Consumer prices in France rose 0.9% from a year ago in February after a 1.8% increase in January, data Frid...

item.title: ECB Rate-Cut Path Faces Growing Risk From Erratic Trump Policies
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Economists have added a big disclaimer to their view that the European Central Bank will cut interest rates three more times: Donald Trump. The US president’s erratic behavior on trade, the international security architecture and domestic politics has left respondents in a Bloomberg s...

Über diese läuft der An- und Verkauf im Hintergrund ab. Das erfuhr Bloomberg News vorab. Auch die Volks- und Raiffeisenbanken setzen bei ihrem ...
